about_the_game:
A collaboration between 『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』 & 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 is here!

The in-game music 『Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again』 from the popular restaurant simulator 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 will be playable in this new added content.
Don't you miss it!
detailed_description:
A collaboration between 『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』 & 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 is here!

The in-game music 『Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again』 from the popular restaurant simulator 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 will be playable in this new added content.
Don't you miss it!
name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost　Touhou Mystia's Izakaya Collab "Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again"

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
